trans:
This year, there is a little change with regard to the party - the party is going to take place at the restaurant as printed in the Invitation
The Executive Committee has held a meeting and done some research on the conditions - It has come to attention that the Choir Hall is held annually - This year, we are not allowed to use the hall after 11:00 a.m. on Sunday since the children are in need of the hall for activities and studying.
As a consequence, there is no time to arrange the tables or do decorations - As for the choir, we must practice singing prior to the ceremony. As a result, we are going to celebrate the patron saint's feast at the restaurant this year - less work
The food is another matter. There are sushi - shrimps - clams - mussels - clams - squid - octopus, which are in abundance without exceeding fee - being served during the meal - feeling luxurious and classy - leaving after eating without having to clean up - It is our hope that you support and prepare for a happy and leisurely patron saint's feast ğŸ˜€
